name: CitiesOfEarth3
title: Cities Of Earth 3
author: hyspeed
description:
This mod creates the world based on an image of Earth.  Maps: Atlantic, Pacific, Olde World, Americas, Africa, Europe, Oceania, United States. 
 The Player chooses what spawn city area.  Optionally has 'teleporters' at each city. 
 Optionallay Pre-placed rocket silos.
